startups.name: LogDNA
startups.description:
Launched in Y Combinator’s Winter 2015 cohort, LogDNA is among a unique class of companies. With the ability to hyperscale and connect to a host of cloud and developer tools, the company solves major pain points while empowering companies to create their own best products—adding unprecedented value to businesses. 

LogDNA is disrupting the market with cloud-based logging that focuses on superior developer experiences. As applications become more integrated into everyday life, the DevOps teams responsible for them are drowning in alerts and massive volumes of logs, wasting countless hours investigating and resolving issues instead of building new products that deliver business value. Other logging tools were built for legacy systems and apps with cloud capabilities bolted on. Born in the cloud and deployed within minutes, LogDNA gives developers rich context as well as complete control over and instant access to their logs. With simple, turnkey integrations with all major operating systems, languages, platforms, and best-in-class DevOps tools. LogDNA improves productivity and collaboration across all roles, eliminating data silos, and enabling autonomous teams.  


LogDNA is the only logging provider to support Kubernetes Enrichment, which enables teams to debug deployment problems without separate tools or deep specialized knowledge by surfacing issues in a single view for seamless troubleshooting. 

The platform’s value to modern cloud-native application development, along with new use cases in DevSecOps, are driving massive growth among hyper-growth startups and Fortune 500 companies alike. In 2020 alone, LogDNA experienced 155% YoY revenue growth, adding more than 800 customers around the world. LogDNA counts major brands—such as Asics, Better.com, SysDig, LaunchDarkly, and 6 River Systems—among its customers. To meet demand, the LogDNA team grew by more than 70% in the past year, including more than 65% growth in the product and engineering teams alone.

startups.name: Noteable
startups.description:
Today, being a data-driven company is required to survive. Most companies realize this, but many struggle with how to put it into action. Data analysts, scientist, and engineers have long held the keys to the data chest. But working across different systems and abilities has only widened the gap, making it hard for teams to share learnings with each other, let alone with their executives and stakeholders. A company might be swimming in data, but that doesn’t mean their teams are enabled to be data-driven. 

Noteable is on a mission to change that. Noteable is an early-stage startup that is tackling the widening gap in today’s modern enterprise data stack. The team behind Noteable has built some of the most sophisticated data tools in the world at industry-leading companies such as Netflix, Amazon, and Apple.

Building on the success they’ve seen notebooks have in their own professional lives, the Noteable team is developing the first enterprise-grade notebook platform that enables every team to interact with data.

startups.name: Sensorium Galaxy
startups.description:
Sensorium Galaxy brings real-life experiences into a digital metaverse — a shared 3D virtual space for everyone to enjoy. Get together, join high-quality shows, and play immersive games in a safe, affordable, and global space.

Sensorium Galaxy moves aside from standard cartoonish avatars used by most VR players. Our platform uses Unreal Engine 4 to generate ultra-realistic characters and virtual environments.

Artificial intelligence allows SG avatars to learn from their users to become more accurate virtual representations. Within weeks, avatars can operate autonomously, meeting people based on your preferences, and engaging in new experiences.

The worlds of the Sensorium Galaxy are also home to a wide range of AI-powered non-player characters. Real users can meet, date, and interact with them at all times. AI technology makes NPCs highly realistic and allows them to dynamically adapt to user preferences to become their “ideal virtual companions” overtime.

Located at the epicenter of SG, PRISM is the world of music. A land where top performers gather to express themselves with absolute freedom. Join them and see how this land mutates under the influence of their art.

Let your moves become your language. Connect with your senses through deep mindfulness & exciting dance performances to an underwater space. Dive into this mystic land to experience deep connections enabled by pure movements.

startups.name: Nimbella
startups.description:
The serverless platforms in use today are lacking the abstractions, automation, and integrations necessary to accelerate adoption of serverless technology in enterprise and new application domains. The Nimbella platform handles configuration of all infrastructure services such as storage management, capacity provisioning, auto-scaling, monitoring, and logging so developers can focus on application logic. Nimbella provides a uniform programming model  to deliver a complete and integrated solution so developers can code once and run in any cloud, thus  enhancing developer productivity.

There will be over 30 million developers in the world and more than 40% will have less than 3 years of experience. The serverless technology levels the playing field and allows the developers to do what they do best. 

Nimbella was named as a strong performer in Forrester FaaS Wave, the only startup to be included in a group that includes  Alibaba, Amazon, Microsoft, Google, and others.

startups.name: Bistroo
startups.description:
Bistroo is a direct-to-consumer marketplace for meals, food & beverages, powered by the BIST token.

Takeaway platforms have made it easy to enjoy our favourite meals, but they’ve made life tough for the restaurants we love.

Current platforms demand that restaurants pay disproportionate fees, while dictating control over data, pay-out and client relations, loyalty and contact. It’s a stitch-up that results in higher costs for consumers and restaurants.

Bistroo puts an end to this, by providing a platform where businesses are back in control. 

Bistroo offers better user experience, lower transaction costs and a fairer infrastructure. Our job is to provide the tools, insights and support to facilitate a direct-2-consumer relationship for our merchants.

The platform has been live in the Netherlands (www.bistroo.nl) since March 2020 and has served over 23,000 customers generating over $2.2mil in platform volume.
